scripts.clean: rm -rf bower_components node_modules output dist .pulp-cache .purs-repl package-lock.json yarn.lock .psc-ide-port
scripts.checkyarn: echo "$npm_execpath" | grep -q "yarn\.js$" || (echo '⚠️  Use yarn not npm! ⚠️ ' && echo && exit 1)
scripts.postinstall: yarn setup && yarn build && yarn alias
scripts.setup: yarn global add purescript pulp bower && bower i
